column4: There are those cheap chinese mobile phones that run windows mobile. Is it possible to install linux on such cell phone? Or there is no linux operating system made for a cell phone. I know there was sth made for ipod. Is there anything to replace windows mobile?
try googleing your celphone model# and the words "install linux", that is how i found out how to install linux on my phone
yes, I think that is the site I found
